title: split_h5mu_train_test
description: Split mudata object into training and testing (and validation) datasets based on observations into separate mudata objects.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. The input (query) data to be labeled
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. The input (query) data to be labeled. Should be a .h5mu file.

modality.description: Type: `string`, default: `rna`. Which modality to process
modality.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `rna`. Which modality to process.

output_train.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output_train.h5mu`, example: `output_train.h5mu`. The output training data in mudata format
output_train.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output_train.h5mu`, example: `output_train.h5mu`. The output training data in mudata format.

output_test.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output_test.h5mu`, example: `output_test.h5mu`. The output testing data in mudata format
output_test.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output_test.h5mu`, example: `output_test.h5mu`. The output testing data in mudata format.

output_val.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.output_val.h5mu`, example: `output_val.h5mu`. The output validation data in mudata format
output_val.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.output_val.h5mu`, example: `output_val.h5mu`. The output validation data in mudata format.

test_size.description: Type: `double`, default: `0.2`. The proportion of the dataset to include in the test split
test_size.help_text: Type: `double`, default: `0.2`. The proportion of the dataset to include in the test split.

val_size.description: Type: `double`. The proportion of the dataset to include in the validation split
val_size.help_text: Type: `double`. The proportion of the dataset to include in the validation split.

shuffle.description: Type: `boolean_true`, default: `false`. Whether or not to shuffle the data before splitting
shuffle.help_text: Type: `boolean_true`, default: `false`. Whether or not to shuffle the data before splitting.

random_state.description: Type: `integer`. The seed used by the random number generator
random_state.help_text: Type: `integer`. The seed used by the random number generator.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
